name: DeadNeverStop
description:
Thank you for joining our game, HERO!

"Dead Never Stop" is a survival-like game that combines tower defense with rogue-like. In this world, you can use unique defense towers to form the last line of defense for humanity against zombies. You'll gather resources from zombies to buy special battle cards, strengthening yourself or your towers. Finally, you'll defeat the leaders of zombies - Zombie Lord, bringing a new dawn for survivors.

It's a survival-like game with tower defense!

Set up your defenses to obliterate the zombies and use the gene pills they drop to buy new defense towers or special battle cards, creating an invincible defensive lineup. With dozens of defense towers and multiple battle cards, you can kill zombies in different ways every game!

Enhance talents and runes!

Using gems in the game to upgrade your talents! Unlock new rune slots, special abilities like hero invincible dodge and ultimate carpet bombing skills, and get various enhancement bonuses to help you survive at higher difficulties. After unlocking rune slots, forge and inlay powerful runes to make your defense much more easier!

The EA version will include:

· 3 heroes with initial cores
· 20 unique defense towers
· 3 maps
· 1 exclusive enhancement card for each defense group
· Abundant universal combat enhancement cards

Before ending EA, we will add more things to the above list and will have other new game mode. Everything will be adjusted based on feedback received during the early access period.

Our following updates will include, but are not limited to:

1.More exclusive enhancement cards to diversify the enhancement directions of each tower
2.New defense towers and combat cards
3.Endless mode
4.Other new game modes
5.Adjust battle cards
6.Adjust difficulty of different level

Thank you for your support of our game! Wish you enjoy yourself in “DeadNeverStop”. And welcome to give us your suggestion.
